Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to increasing the mandatory retirement age for New York police department members
Summary: Relates to increasing the mandatory retirement age for New York police department members from 62 to 65.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to increasing the mandatory retirement age for New York police department members
